articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Keycloak je Identity provider (IDP) a Single Sign On (SSO). Umožní vám spravovat uživatele na jednom místě a vytvořit single sign on – jediné místo pro přihlášení uživatelů. Už nemusíte psát jméno a heslo do každé aplikace zvlášť. Připravili jsme pro vás školení Keycloak SSO, které proběhne 10. a 11. února a zúčastnit se ho můžete online.

Battlemage v testu doprovodily starší modely předchozí generace Alchemist. Výsledky jsou k dispozici v testu, obecně lze konstatovat, že jsou značně nevyrovnané. Jednou je karta viditelně rychlejší pod Windows, jindy zase na Linuxu a někdy jsou výsledky víceméně vyrovnané.

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
If you've started to complete the new schematics of the Palworld Feybreak update, you'll find the requirement for a certain resource called Hexolite to make them.


This unique metal is exclusively available from the Feybreak region, but not in the way you might think. Unlike Chromite, you can't directly farm Hexolite. The trick is to farm the three ingredients required to produce Hexolite, and that process will be necessary if you want to keep building the schematics.


How to make Hexolite in Palworld


To make Hexolite, you'll need the following resources in the mentioned quantities.



Chromite x5


Hexolite Quartz x12


Ore x20



Ore is an old resource which can be found all over the map. For Chromite and Hexolite Quartz, you'll have to travel to Feybreak Island. Check this guide out to efficiently farm Chromite after reaching the island. For Hexolite Quartz, you can use your pickaxe on the nodes that can be found all around the island.


Hexolite Quartz nodes are really bright and stand out, and you can find them on the beach. Once you have the required ingredients, Hexolite can be made at the Blast Furnace. Make sure to have your Technology at level 56 or higher to unlock the production procedure.




All Hexolite recipes in Palworld


Hexolite is required to craft several new items in the Feybreak update. These include:



Exotic Sphere


Beam Sword


Advanced Bow (multiple types)


Laser Gatling Gun (multiple types)


Plasma Cannon (multiple types)


Hexolite Armor (multiple types)


Heat Resistant Hexolite Armor (multiple types)


Cold Resistant Hexolite Armor (multiple types)


Lightweight Hexolite Armor (multiple types)


Hexolite Helmet (multiple types)


Triple Jump Boots


Advanced Arrow


Plasma Cartridge


Advanced Shield


Silvegis Saddle


Bastigor's Hammer


Advanced Sphere Assembly Line


Larg-Scale Electric Egg Incubator


Medicine Facility


Pal Pod


Advanced Chest.


The post Best way to farm Hexolite in Palworld appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Best way to farm Hexolite in Palworld

articles.author: Christian Dawson
articles.description:
The year was 2006 and Sony's PlayStation 3 was hitting markets around the world, unless you lived in Europe or Australia. The seventh console generation was upon us and Sony was determined to wow critics and fans alike with its Spider-Man-inspired font, Blu-ray drive, and plenty of exclusives that are some of the best PS3 games around.


It was a beloved console with some of the best titles in all of gaming, in my opinion. So we've compiled a ranking of the best you could find on the PlayStation 3.


The Top 20 PS3 games you can play

articles.description:
The Feybreak update went live in Palworld on December 23 across all platforms, and one of its biggest additions is the introduction of the new island.


Feybreak Island is the shining light of this expansion, and it's a new location filled with new pals to be captured and mysteries to be solved. But first, you'll have to reach the island in order to discover what lies there, and that can be slightly confusing.


So here's how to find Feybreak Island in Palworld.


Palworld Feybreak Island location explained


The Feybreak island is located in the south-west part of the main map. If you've traveled to Mount Obsidian, the new island is next to it, with the coordinates being -700 and -890. There are different ways to get there, but the most efficient will be from Fisherman's Point.


To travel over there, you can either use a flying Pal or a Pal who can swim. The first task you'll want to do is to activate the Scorched Ashland waypoint at coordinates -810 and -826, as it will activate fast travel to Feybreak Island.


Screenshot by Destructoid


If you're taking the aerial route, the island has anti-air weapons in place. This means that you and your pal will be shot down if you continue approaching the island by air. One good strategy is to get close to the island and then just swim. If you find that your stamina isn't enough, just get on top of your pal and get down immediately.


The easier alternative is to use a Pal that can swim, as you won't have to care about the defensive mechanisms. Once you reach the island, you'll be able to explore it and get new resources like Chromite. However, be careful of your player level (like don't do what I did), and make sure you're above Level 50 if you don't want to worry too much about the Pals or enemies that you might encounter.

The post How to reach Feybreak island in Palworld appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to reach Feybreak island in Palworld

articles.description:
Palworld's Feybreak update has added plenty of new content, and you can complete bounties to unlock different rewards to aid your in-game journey.


The Feybreak expansion is now live across all platforms, and bounties are an interesting addition. They can be considered side quests that you can engage in in your free time, and completing them will earn you rewards. These simple activities can also be done routinely, allowing you to gain more resources in the process.


How to start a bounty in Palworld


To begin a bounty in Palworld, you'll need to speak with Intel Dealers. These dealers can be found all around the island, and you can look for them in settlements. You can also find them beside the fast travel locations, so knowing where they are is the easy part. Once you interact with them, you'll get the description of Bounty Targets that are available in the area.




How to complete a bounty in Palworld


Once you've got the details about a Bounty Target, you'll need to track them down. Then, you can either capture them or defeat them. The choice is entirely yours, although defeating them might be useful. Once you defeat/capture a Bounty Target, they will drop something called Bounty Tokens. This is the main resource you can earn by completing bounties in Palworld.


Once you've found some Bounty Tokens, look for the Vigilante Bounty Officer npc. You can usually find them in settlements, and they will provide you with different rewards in exchange for these tokens.


If you undertake a harder bounty, you'll need to track and defeat different bosses. They will reward you with boss bounty tokens, which are special resources required to access dungeons. These dungeons are mostly related to endgame content, so you can avoid them for the time being if you're a beginner. All things considered, bounties in Palworld can be an excellent source of farming certain items, but it can feel slightly repetitive after a while.

Books are often called windows into other worlds, and they are, but they can also be mirrors through which we can see ourselves from a new perspective. Ten-year-olds are more reflective than people think; I've met fourth-graders who ask questions adults like me are too scared to even think about. articles.author: Daniel Morris
articles.description:
Dead Space fans, look away now. Series creator Glen Schofield has revealed that EA recently rejected a pitch from him and two other developers who worked on the original game for a potential Dead Space 4. 


Earlier this year, it was reported that the Dead Space series had been put on ice at EA after Motive's 2023 remake of the original game did not meet the publisher's expectations. This was despite positive reviews, with many believing the game to be an improvement on the 2008 survival-horror classic. However, it seems this may be the last we see of the series for some time.


Image via EA


Glen Schofield's Dead Space 4 pitch was recently rejected


Glen Schofield, creator and director of the original game, revealed in an interview with Dan Allen Gaming that he had pitched a potential Dead Space 4 to EA this year, alongside creative director Bret Robbins and animation director Christopher Stone. 


"We didn't go too deep - they just said no, we're not interested right now, we appreciate it, blah blah blah, and you know, we know who to talk to, so we didn’t take it any further... they know their numbers and what they have to ship and all that," Schofield explained.




Stone jumped in to attempt to explain EA's decision further, claiming, "The industry is in a weird place right now. People are really hesitant to take chances on things, so you’ve got to you know, take it with a grain of salt, who knows, maybe one day, I think we’d all love to do it." 


While Dead Space might not be in EA's immediate plans, it will be interesting to see if the publisher returns to it in the future. Even more curious will be to see if it returns to Schofield to explore his plans further. He wasn't involved in the series beyond the original game, but could be just what it needs for some original ideas.

The post EA recently rejected a Dead Space 4 pitch from series creator appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: EA recently rejected a Dead Space 4 pitch from series creator

Out of all the required resources, Predator Cores are the hardest to find. They drop from Predator Pals, who spawn all over the map. Their spawn location doesn't show on the map, which makes it hard for you to detect and defeat them. Typically, Predator Pals will have a red glow about them, indicating their special nature.

articles.author: Andrew Heaton
articles.description:
Remember all those years ago when we first got a glimpse of Skyrim? My word, but it was gorgeous. Jaw-dropping vistas of the colder parts of Tamriel were something to behold. Fast-forward some 13 years later and vanilla TES5 has certainly aged to some extent. But there's still life in the ol' girl, yet.


As noted by DSO Gaming, someone has created a version of Skyrim with a graphical kiss of life, so to speak. Specifically, someone has ported the game over to Unreal Engine 5, and you can now play the demo of this fan project.




The video above gives a taste of how much it's improved the overall look of Bethesda's aging RPG. The person responsible for the port – one Greg Coulthard – says they wrote their own C++ plugin, which allows it to read the ESM files of Skyrim, which also automates "landscape generation and object placement" within UE5. You can download the demo from Discord here. Just look for the link pinned to the top of the "bethesda_unreal" channel.


Just a lovely stroll through the world


A couple of things to note: first, Coulthard says their version uses the vanilla assets of Skyrim, so it will still look very close to the 2011 release, just with much better visuals. Second, DSO notes that the demo only contains the world, so there's no gameplay or RPG mechanics to speak of.


Basically, if you just want to have a leisurely walk through Skyrim's land, wondering what could have been had Bethesda built the game in Unreal Engine, this is your chance. As for when we will have a full release of the project, it's hard to say at this stage. For all we know, it may never emerge.


Essentially, go into this with an understanding that it's more of a proof of concept than an example of things to come. But, hey, it's at least another way for Skyrim to retain some degree of relevance while we wait ever longer for updates on The Elder Scrolls 6.

The post Skyrim has been ported to Unreal Engine 5, and it’s stunningly beautiful appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Skyrim has been ported to Unreal Engine 5, and it’s stunningly beautiful

articles.description:
In a landmark ruling, the Court of Milan has ordered Cloudflare to block pirate streaming services that offer Serie A football matches. The court found that Cloudflare's services are instrumental in facilitating access to live pirate streams, undermining Italy's 'Piracy Shield' legislation. The order affects Cloudflare's CDN, DNS resolver, WARP and proxy services, and includes a broad data disclosure section. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Cloudflare Must Block ‘Piracy Shield’ Domains and IP Addresses Across its Service

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Around 2016, sports streaming site Rojadirecta closed its doors to visitors from Spain after losing its legal battle with Mediapro. Despite the win, the broadcaster was disappointed that the court had found the company behind Rojadirecta liable, but not company owner Igor Seoane. After the Supreme Court held that Seoane could be held liable, last Friday a court confirmed total damages of $33 million, with Seoane and the company jointly liable for half of that amount.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Rojadirecta & Site Operator Hit With $33m Piracy Damages Judgment

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Once-thriving Usenet provider NSE was targeted by Dutch anti-piracy group BREIN many years ago. Under legal pressure, the provider felt forced to shut down its successful business. Though NSE ultimately triumphed in court, that victory came years later. NSE is now demanding millions of euros to compensate for the alleged damage to its business. BREIN, however, sees things differently. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ‘Destroyed’ Usenet Provider Sues Anti-Piracy Group for Millions in Damages

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Every week we take a close look at the most pirated movies on torrent sites. What are pirates downloading? 'Venom: The Last Dance' tops the chart, followed by 'Red One'. 'Kraven The Hunter' completes the top three.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Top 10 Most Pirated Movies of The Week – 12/23/2024

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Popular shadow library LibGen continues to face trouble. In addition to ongoing technical problems, a U.S. lawsuit resulted in several domain suspensions and seizures in recent weeks. To top it off, the shadow library was just added to Germany's pirate site blocking list, making it harder to access the remaining domains.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Domain Seizures and German ISP Blockade Add to Libgen’s Troubles

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Sixteen well-known suppliers active in the UK pirate IPTV market have been selected by broadcaster Sky to star in a new phase of the company's ISP blocking program. A new order obtained at the High Court is technically an extension of an existing order won last year. However, with significant tweaks, upgrades and an extremely determined opponent, pirates may be about to face their toughest challenge yet.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Sky’s Enhanced High Court Pirate IPTV Blocking Order Closes Loopholes

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The easiest way to hurt a pirate site, at least temporarily, is by taking away its domain name. Historically, domain name registries have been hesitant to take action but with the right approach, progress can be made. This week, anti-piracy group BREIN reported that following their complaints, the .nl and .eu registries took action against several 'pirate' domains. On closer inspection, it appears that copyright has little to do with it.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: EU and NL Domain Registries Take Down Piracy-Linked Domains

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Coordinated by Italy last month, a huge law enforcement operation reportedly 'dismantled' a pirate IPTV service with 22 million users. That's an extraordinary number and shows why countries like Italy have adopted mass site blocking measures. Logic suggests that the removal of such a huge player from the market might reduce the need for blocking measures, if only temporarily. The data shows that in the wake of the action, blocking demands significantly increased.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Dismantling a 22m User Pirate IPTV Service Led to Big Rise in ISP Blocking

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Two decades ago, the torrenting world lost a legend: Suprnova.org. This pioneering file-sharing site, once a hub for millions of users, was abruptly shut down on December 19th, 2004. Today, we revisit the Suprnova story and speak with the site's founder about its lasting impact and the YouTube empire he built in recent years.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Suprnova’s Founder Speaks: 20 Years, Many Lessons, and a YouTube Empire

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Italians who simply view pirate IPTV via illicit subscriptions have been warned for months that their activities could be reported to the judicial authorities for potential prosecution. As part of an investigation into a pirate IPTV subscription seller, a total of 23 people have appeared in court in recent months for simply buying a pirate package. Judges in two separate proceedings have now acquitted all 23 after concluding that this type of piracy isn't actually a crime.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Judges Acquit a Total of 23 Pirate IPTV Subscribers: Personal Use is Not a Crime

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The Federal Court of Canada has issued a new site blocking order requiring major ISPs to block access to Soap2Day domains. The order was issued in response to a lawsuit filed by Netflix, Bell, and several major Hollywood studios alleging copyright infringement.  The operators of the associated Soap2Day domains must pay millions of Canadian dollars in damages. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Netflix and Hollywood Obtain Canadian Site Blocking Order Against Pirate ‘Brand’ Soap2Day

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Suing people for consuming content illegally can be a risky endeavor for companies with brands to protect. Nevertheless, sports rightsholders now seem prepared to put brand integrity on the line in their fight against IPTV pirates. Spain's LaLiga is already mailing out 'fines', ostensibly to people who simply watched pirate streams. Predictably, there's more to it than that.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: LaLiga Isn’t ‘Fining’ IPTV Pirates For Viewing Streams, But For Providing Them

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
For over a decade, The Pirate Bay has been accepting Bitcoin donations. In dollar terms, this provided a relatively modest but consistent revenue stream. However, if the torrent site had held onto its early Bitcoin, it could have amassed a small fortune, worth $14 million today. The same applies to BitcoinTorrentz, which once charged today's equivalent of $8,000 per gigabyte transferred.  
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: The Pirate Bay’s Million-Dollar Bitcoin Donations: Hidden Goldmine or Spent Treasure?

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Japan-based anti-piracy group CODA is reporting new successes in its overseas efforts to disrupt access to pirate sites. Earlier this month, operators of pirate anime sites in Brazil received in-person visits from CODA, acting on behalf of three major Japanese anime producers. CODA reports that Bakashi.tv, the third most-visited anime site in Brazil, shut down among 15 in total. No other sites are officially named, but our unofficial list provides a few pointers.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Japanese Anime Companies Shut Down Another 15 Pirate Sites in Brazil

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The first pirate site blocking order in Canada was 'discontinued' this week. The plaintiffs, including rightsholders Bell and Rogers, won't request an extension of the landmark blocking measures against IPTV service GoldTV. Interestingly, many of the targeted domains are still online. No reason was provided for the discontinuation, but costs and changed priorities likely play a role.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Canada’s First Pirate Site Blocking Order Quietly Expires

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
In a recent filing at the Ninth Circuit Court of Appeals, ISP Cox maintains that DMCA subpoenas don't apply to Internet providers. Several movie studios hope to convince the court otherwise, as that would strengthen their piracy enforcement efforts, making it easier to identify online pirates. According to Cox, however, Congress clearly excluded ISPs from this legal 'shortcut'.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Cox to Appeals Court: DMCA Subpoenas Don’t Apply to Us, Period

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
In an ongoing escalation of its fight against online sports piracy, media giant Canal+ secured court orders compelling DNS providers Quad9 and Vercara to block access to pirate streaming sites in France. Quad9 says that it's determined to appeal what it sees as an absurd application of copyright law. For now, however, it will block the targeted domain names globally.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: French Piracy Blocking Order Goes Global, DNS Service Quad9 Vows to Fight

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Italy's Piracy Shield IPTV blocking system is back in the news today after yet another completely avoidable blocking blunder. On Monday night, yet another CDN IP address was added to the blocklist rendering innocent sites unavailable. Italian tech news site DDaY, a long-standing critic of Piracy Shield's indiscriminate blocking, was among those affected.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Piracy Shield Blacks Out Tech News Site by Blocking Another CDN IP

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Trouble continues for the popular torrent site TorrentGalaxy. After several technical issues last week, the site has become unreachable. At the same time, the related 'TGxGoodies' uploader accounts at other torrent sites have been inactive for days. TorrentGalaxy switched owners earlier this year, but it's unclear what's behind the recent problems. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: TorrentGalaxy’s Troubles Silence Popular Upload Bots (Update)

articles.author: nospam@scummvm.org (criezy)
articles.description:

Notable engine enhancements

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Učebnicový příklad toho, jak někdo viděl fungující originál ("Sentimental", Španělsko 2020) a natočil jeho český "srandovnější" remake, aniž by chápal proč a jak ten originál fungoval. (Ilča 30 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: V dobrém i zlém - 20 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: "Bohužel" tento film není tak špatný, aby byl zábavný. Je to jen nuda, která není vůbec ničím zajímavá. Takhle nějak si představuji, že budou vypadat stoprocentně AI generované filmy. Nejzajímavější a nejzábavnější je malá role Russella Crowea.  (Ilča 40 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Lovec Kraven [Kraven The Hunter] - 40 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Někdo napsal scénář s cool zápletkami a dialogy, někdo vymodeloval úžasná prostředí, někdo složil hudbu a nahrál dialogy skoro jako John Williams a Harrison Ford... To všechno funguje velmi dobře. Ale je to proloženo otravnou hrou, kde pořádně nefunguje boj, stealth ani puzzly, a jejíž interaktivita zdržuje od toho cool příběhu.
articles.title: Skororecenze: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description:
Za pár dní má v našich kinech (a po celém světě) premiéru "remasterovaná verze" kultovní animované podívané Interstella 5555. A je důležité říct si něco o tom, o jakou podívanou vlastně jde a v čem přesně spočívá ten "remaster".
U zrodu tohoto počinu stálo elektronické hudební duo Daft Punk, které v roce 2001 vydalo své album "Discovery". K písničkám z alba vyšly animované videoklipy, které produkoval Leidži Macumoto, což byl kultovní japonský výtvarník (zemřel loni), který měl na svém kontě mnoho animovaných seriálů, především ze 70. - 80. let (nejslavnější z nich byl asi "Space Battleship Yamato"). Daft Punk ho oslovili proto, že na jeho seriálech vyrůstali, takže výsledné dílo, včetně "jednodušší" retro animace a naivní zápletky zcela záměrně připomíná staré japonské televizní počiny (n…
articles.title: Recenze: Daft Punk & Leiji Matsumoto's Interstella 5555 - 70 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Pokud zbožňujete stejnojmenný divadelní muzikál, funguje tento film pravděpodobně velmi dobře. Pokud ho vůbec neznáte, budete ve výrazné nevýhodě, a to z vícero důvodů. Přestože mám muzikály rád, téměř vůbec se u mě nedostavil jakýkoliv pocit dojetí nebo jiná silná emoce a z písniček si téměř nic nepamatuji. Což je bizarní, protože zbožňuji písničky v "Princi egyptském", kterého napsal stejný autor pár let před "Čarodějkou". - Ilča 50 %
articles.title: Audio recenze: Čarodějka [Wicked - Part 1] - 70 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Naprosto nezajímavé ve všech směrech, od scénáře, přes výtvarnou podobu a písničky, až po režii. V některých aspektech horší než jednička, v žádných lepší.  (Ilča 40 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Odvážná Vaiana 2 [Moana 2] - 50 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Kvalitní herecké výkony, občas slušná atmosféra, ale scénář je tak děravý, že si každou chvíli říkáte "proč to proboha udělal(a)?" a místy až znemožňuje pochopit, co se právě děje (je to sofistikovaná hra, nebo jí jenom praskly nervy?). Což je diametrální rozdíl oproti skvěle promyšlenému "Tísňovému volání". (Ilča 50 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Dozorkyně [Vogter] - 60 %
